Source code for vpipe.steps.dataprep.data_processor

import logging
from vbrainer.pipeline.steps.simple_ml_data_processor import SimpleMLDataProcessor

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)



[docs]class DataProcessor(SimpleMLDataProcessor):
    """
    Based on the Simple MLDTA Processor present on vbrainer, this step can perform strip, trim, drop, fillna with zero operations. Missing Values step can also be used to fill absent values in more robust ways. 

    :dataset_name (str):
        The dataset where to perfomr the operation (mandatory)
    :column (str):
        The column where the transformation should be applied (mandatory) 
    :processing (list):
        A list containing all the processing that should be performed can be: strip, trim, fillna and drop

    .. code-block:: python
        
        {
            "id": "d01",
            "enabled": true,
            "step_name": "DataProcessor",
            "params": {
                "processing_steps": [
                    {
                        "dataset_name": "target",
                        "column": "item_id",
                        "processing": [
                            "strip"
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    """
    pass
